Package lazyTrees

Class Item

java.lang.Object
lazyTrees.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Item>
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Item>
One object of Item class represents one item in the inventory, with two class members.

      public boolean decrementCount()
      Reduce the count by 1 each call and return false when count is less than 1.
      Returns:
      Whether the count of the item was successfully decreased by 1.
